name: Run & Gun NC
description:
Run & Gun: No Control

20XX, You are at your base and you suddenly receive news of an enemy attack!

Professor has created a defense machine and you have been asked to control it!

Wait a second, there seems to be a problem with the machine... OH NO! The movement system seems to be malfunctioning. There is no time for fixing it. Professor and other people at the base put their hopes on you as you now have to use your skills to manuever yet another failure of Professor!

Battle with endless waves of enemies and face a bigger challenge each time!

After every few waves, you discover more problems with your Professor's invention, Turret Aim Malfunction, Fire Rate Problems and Slamming into walls? 

Extra Details:

A submission to GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control)

Game Engine: Unity.  Art made using Aseprite.  Music made using Bosca Ceoil. SFX made using bfxr.

Game By Shinado Uzake
